title: Economic Australia
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Australia - Economic conditions
description: Episode number 11 of Series "Film Australia's Australia". Through the sequences in "Economic Australia" students have a rare opportunity to turn back the clock to witness filmmakers' views of Australia's economic development. The content focuses on some major events in the economic history of the nation as well as those everyday situations in which economics plays a part in our lives. Presented by Annette Shun Wah.
